insert.selectKey: select count(1) from E_LP_HSTLEREF where hisnameid = #{hisnameid}
insert.if: insert into E_LP_HSTLEREF ( hisnameid, pripid, name, certype, cerno, s_ext_fromnode, s_ext_datatime ) values ( #{hisnameid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pripid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certype, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cerno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 440300, SYSDATE )
